mapper.sql: UUID, USERNAME, PWD, NAME, GENDER, EMAIL, TELE, ADDRESS, BIRTHDAY, DEPUUID
mapper.insert: insert into emp (UUID, USERNAME, PWD, NAME, GENDER, EMAIL, TELE, ADDRESS, BIRTHDAY, DEPUUID) values (#{uuid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{username,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{pwd,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{gender,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{email,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{tele,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{address,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{birthday,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{depuuid,jdbcType=INTEGER})

insert into emp
UUID,
USERNAME,
PWD,
NAME,
GENDER,
EMAIL,
TELE,
ADDRESS,
BIRTHDAY,
DEPUUID,

mapper.update:
update emp
USERNAME = #{username,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
PWD = #{pwd,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
NAME = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
GENDER = #{gender,jdbcType=INTEGER},
EMAIL = #{email,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
TELE = #{tele,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ADDRESS = #{address,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
BIRTHDAY = #{birthday,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
DEPUUID = #{depuuid,jdbcType=INTEGER},
where UUID = #{uuid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

update emp set USERNAME = #{username,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, PWD = #{pwd,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, NAME = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, GENDER = #{gender,jdbcType=INTEGER}, EMAIL = #{email,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, TELE = #{tele,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ADDRESS = #{address,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, BIRTHDAY = #{birthday,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, DEPUUID = #{depuuid,jdbcType=INTEGER} where UUID = #{uuid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
